moa.gui

Interface OptionEditComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassOptionEditComponent, ClassOptionWithNamesEditComponent, FileOptionEditComponent, FlagOptionEditComponent, FloatOptionEditComponent, IntOptionEditComponent, MultiChoiceOptionEditComponent, StringOptionEditComponent, WEKAClassOptionEditComponent

    public interface OptionEditComponent
    Interface representing a component to edit an option.

    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
